title: Jumbled Visma: ‘Mega Merger’ Would Reshape the WorldTour, but at What Cost?
content:
Analysis: The head-spinning story keeps evolving, with new reports that Patrick Lefevere might form a 'place-holder team' if Soudal Quick-Step closes shop.

Read the full article at Jumbled Visma: ‘Mega Merger’ Would Reshape the WorldTour, but at What Cost? on Velo.
author: ahood
